post.description: This method provides address for depositing cryptocurrency.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Cryptocurrency which you want to deposit. Required.

parameters.name: newAddress
parameters.description: Do you want to get new crypto address or you want to receive previous     address. 1 - generate new address. 0 - get old address. Default value is 0.

post.description: This method provides information about single user transaction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Transaction ID. Required.

post.description:
This method provides cancelling processing withdraw All parameters are obligatory (ie. none may
be null)

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Id of transaction which you want to cancel

post.description:
This method provides preparing for submitting crypto withdraw All parameters are obligatory
(ie. none may be null)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Crypto address

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of cryptocurrency you want to withdraw

parameters.name: commission
parameters.description: Amount of cryptocurrency you want to spend as network fee. If not sent -     default commission will be used

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Cryptocurrency name

post.description:
This method provides preparing for submitting crypto withdraw All parameters are obligatory
(ie. none may be null)

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount of fiat you want to withdraw

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Fiat currency name

post.description:
This method provides submitting withdraw by transactionId, which we got from crypto or fiat
withdraw All parameters are obligatory (ie. none may be null)

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Id of transaction which you want to submit

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of orders to display

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of trades to display

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of transactions to display. Default value is 1000

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Time to which start selecting transaction by transaction time(UNIX time). If this     value is not null order will become «ASK»

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Time to which start selecting trades by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is not     null order will become «asc»

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Time to which start selecting orders by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is not     null order will become «asc».

parameters.name: end_id
parameters.description: ID of the last trade of the selection

parameters.name: end_id
parameters.description: ID of the last order of the selection

parameters.name: end_id
parameters.description: ID of the last transaction of the selection

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: ID of the first trade of the selection

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: ID of the first transaction of the selection

parameters.name: from_id
parameters.description: ID of the first transaction of the selection

parameters.name: from_id
parameters.description: ID of the first order of the selection

parameters.name: from_id
parameters.description: ID of the first trade of the selection

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order in which transactions shown. Possible values: «asc» — from first to last,     «desc» — from last to first. Default value is «desc»

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order in which orders shown. Possible values: «asc» — from first to last, «desc» —     from last to first. Default value is «desc»

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order in which transactions shown. Possible values: «asc» — from first to last,     «desc» — from last to first. Default value is «DESK»

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Id of order to cancel

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Currency pair

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Currency pair.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: the pair to display the orders eg. btcusd

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Time from which start selecting orders by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is     not null order will become «asc».

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Time from which start selecting transaction by transaction time(UNIX time). If     this value is not null order will become «ASK»

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Time from which start selecting trades by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is     not null order will become «asc»

post.description: This method provides fees for current user
This method provides information about user orders history. All parameters are nullable

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of orders to display

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Time to which start selecting orders by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is not     null order will become "asc".

parameters.name: endId
parameters.description: ID of the last order of the selection

parameters.name: fromId
parameters.description: ID of the first order of the selection

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order in which orders shown. Possible values: "asc" — from first to last, "desc" —     from last to first. Default value is "desc"

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Currency pair.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Time from which start selecting orders by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is     not null order will become "asc".

post.description: This method provides information about user trades history. All parameters are nullable

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of trades to display

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Time to which start selecting trades by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is not     null order will become "asc"

parameters.name: endId
parameters.description: ID of the last trade of the selection

parameters.name: fromId
parameters.description: ID of the first trade of the selection

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order in which trades are displayed. Possible values: "asc" — from first to last,     "desc" — from last to first. Default value is "desc"

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Currency pair

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Time from which start selecting trades by trade time(UNIX time). If this value is     not null order will become "asc"

post.description:
This method provides information about user balance, server time, active orders count, rights
of the currently used keys.

This method provides cancelling active order operation. All parameters are obligatory (ie. none
may be null)

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Id of order to cancel

post.description: This method provides cancelling all active order operation

none may be null)

parameters.description: Id of order to show status

post.description:
This method provides information about active user orders. All parameters are obligatory (ie.
none may be null)

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: the pair to display the orders eg. btcusd

post.description: This method provides trading volume for user
